trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [total number of dots v] to [0] set [number of dots v] to [1] ask [Please enter a sequence of cards ('B' for black and 'W' for white):] and wait set [cards v] to (answer) set [index v] to (length of (cards)) repeat (length of (cards)) if <(letter (index) of (cards)) = [W]> then set [total number of dots v] to ((total number of dots) + (number of dots)) end set [number of dots v] to ((number of dots) * (2)) set [index v] to ((index) - (1)) end say (total number of dots)
